name: stuff.co.nz remove top banner and ads
description: Remove advertising and top banner on stuff.co.nz, and generally just leave the news. UPDATED : to remove the mastercard background image and the mastercard flash ad at teh top of the page.
css:
@-moz-document domain("stuff.co.nz") {

#trademenavbar, #masthead, #sponsored_links, #adSpace7, #right_col_ad_box, #adSpace0, #adSpace1, #adSpace2, #adSpace4, #adSpace5, #adSpace6, #adSpace3, #landing_header_title a,

#adHOMEPAGETOPRIGHT,
#adHOMEPAGEMIDDLERIGHT,
#adSECTIONTOPRIGHT,
#adSECTIONTOPLEFT,
#adSTUFFENTERTAINMENTWIDE,
#adRELEVANTOFFER1,
.hbox_top_sponsor,
#adspecial_offer_box,
#adsponsored_links_box,
#adSTORYBODY,
#adfeatured_promobox,
span.hidden_ad,
#trademe-slider,
#M1ACV,
#pagetop_masthead,
#trademenav,
#pagetop,
.popup, 
#popup,
#home_features,
#home_nav,
#date_home,
#search_box,
#home_top_midcol,
#greybar,
#home-slider-wrapper,
#home-slider-placeholder,
.left_col_pointer_box,
#customise,
#footer-newspapers,
#footer-sitemap,
#footer,
#uber_pointer,
#slidedown {display:none !important;}
#landing_header_title span a {display:inline;}
#related_box {width:940px;}
#related_box div#related_box_left,
#related_box div#related_box_right {width:470px;}

}

body {background-image:none !important;}
